message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $145. I believe this is a fair offer considering the value this product brings.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $145, which would be $117.50. Can you consider that?
